comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
Taken at the Parker Quintet's New York opening at the Deuces on Thursday, August 7, 1947.
("Parker playing at the Deuces," Down Beat, Aug. 27, 1947, 18. “Stewart, Parker on 52nd Street,” Richmond Afro-American, August 16, 6:).

comment.author: 53218045@N03
comment._content: the quality of these shots are amazing

comment.author: 51986335@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the feedback! You may find it interesting to compare this version of the photograph with the one Gottlieb ended up publishing in "The Golden Age of Jazz": lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/loc.natlib.gottlieb.06831/page...

comment.author: 41439198@N02
comment._content: sweet shot. love the look in Bird's eyes.
